articles.author: Corinne Reichert
articles.title: Apple event alert: We could see new Apple products by the end of the month - CNET
articles.description: No, it's not the iPhone 13. But Apple could reveal new products like the AirPods 3 or a smart tracker at a rumored March 23 event.
